connect20/markdown.name: connect20/markdown

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/markdown.description: Markdown as module for Magento! Replaces the TinyMCE editor. Markdown is a text-to-HTML conversion tool for web writers. Markdown allows you to write using an easy-to-read, easy-to-write plain text format, then convert it to structurally valid XHTML (or HTML).
